There is a new name in fashion. The most illustrious job vacancy in the industry has been filled, with Gucci announcing the appointment of Sabato de Sarno to the role of creative director.

articles.title: A Princess Diana dress has sold at auction for more than $600000 - Sky News Australia
articles.description:
A dress once owned by the late Princess Diana has sold at auction for more than $600,00.

The strapless silk and velvet evening gown last sold for just over $24,000 in 1997 before her tragic death when the British Royal donated 79 dresses to a charity auction…
